        public java.lang.String httpImagePost(java.lang.String urlString,
                                      ProfileImage image)
        Parameters:
        urlString - This is the url of the image, TAG,
        image - This is the image to be uploaded to opensrp server.
        Returns:
        String This returns the response obtained from the opensrp server.
        Since:
        2019-04-25 This method uploads an image to opensrp server. Migration from the old method that used httpclient
